content: in the next stitch 4 single_crochet 44sc end with a slip_stitch cut the yarn with scissors it forms a square take the white yarn round 1 44 single_crochet crochet blo only this round rnds 2-5 single_crochet in each st around 4 rounds 44sc end with a slip_stitch cut the yarn with scissors hood and bumper start with brown yarn on opposite sides turning row 4 nadezhda kosmakova handmade toys https //www etsy com/shop/myjoyknitting row 1 11 single_crochet crochet flo only this round chain st turn row 2-4 11 single_crochet in each st loop previous row chain st turn row 5 11 single_crochet in each st loop previous row on the one hand trim the thread with not cut the other continue crochet in a spiral i e at the end of the row slip_stitch is not needed rnds 1-5 single_crochet in each st around 5 rounds 64sc 5 nadezhda kosmakova handmade toys https //www etsy com/shop/myjoyknitting next knit the bottom of the machine now we knit on one of the long sides turning the row chain st turn each row except the last rows1-11 single_crochet in each st row 21sc fasten_off leave a long enough tail we sew on three sides gradually filling and shaping the car wheels make 4 use gray yarn round 1 in a magic_ring single_crochet 6 6sc round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch from last round 12sc round 3 black yarn 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch 6 times 18sc round 4 1 single_crochet in next 2 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch 6 times 24sc round 5 24 single_crochet crochet blo only this round round 6 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 6 times 18sc 6 nadezhda kosmakova handmade toys https //www etsy com/shop/myjoyknitting round 7 1 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 6 times 12sc a little stuff round 8 decrease 6sc fasten_off leave a long enough tail sew the wheels to the car lights make 2 use yellow yarn round 1 in a magic_ring single_crochet 6 6sc end with a slip_stitch and fasten_off leave a long enough tail sew the lights to the car wow congrats the car is ready if you have any questions or suggestions regarding this pattern please email me at kosmakova@inbox ru 7
